name: Melia Palas Atenea

reviews.text: Our party of six were very happy with the Melia Palas Atenea on our 4 day break. The staff were friendly enough, the breakfasts were outstanding and the location was good, 5 euros in a taxi to the centre of Palma or a beautiful walk along passed the marina and some of the biggest yachts you will ever see. The pool area was great plenty of space and a nice bar to cool down at. Although we didn't have a cathedral view we did have a sea view of the marina. Our rooms were great, large and clean and well maintained. Flights and hotel were booked through flyglobespan. In summary I wouldn't hesitate to recommend this hotel.
reviews.title: Wonderful Atenea

likes.disliked: — Just a tad too far from centre

reviews.text: Thought this was a lovely hotel.
reviews.title: Pleasant Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The check in was very quick. The lifts were a little strange but easy to get used to, you just need to press the floor number you require in order to request the lift and once you step in it'll take you directly to that floor.
reviews.title: Good 4 star -

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The room was pretty spacious and spotless. As our room was on the side, the balcony view we had to the front of the hotel was the lovely marina, and to the back was a run down disused swimming pool which was not so nice.
reviews.title: Brilliant Breakfasts!

likes.disliked: — Decor a little tired - not the end of the world!

reviews.text: The only issue I really had was with the concierge who was very unhelpful. We asked if he could book us a restaurant we had heard of - this seemed to be a great effort for him - then he came back and advised it was fully booked (wouldn't be surprised if he hadn't bothered!) and then never offered any other recommendations.
reviews.title: Pleasant, but not that great

reviews.text: As a party of four we spent three nights in the Melia Palas Atenea. We all agreed that it was a very good hotel in a superb location on the Paseo Maritimo. Very handy for catching the open top bus tour of the city! Also within easy walking distance of the cathedral and old town. As other contributors have said, the champagne breakfast on offer is superb. We also used the restaurant at the entrance and had a very pleasant dining experience. There are several restaurants of good quality very close by. Would certainly use this hotel again.
reviews.title: Great Hotel

reviews.text: Stayed for a short 4 night break, 2 adults with 2 teenagers. Everything commented on in previous reviews is correct this is definately one of the best 4 star hotels I have stopped in anywhere in the world.All staff are extremely helpfuland polite, and the breakfast buffet well ......better off just going to try it for yourself , this Hotel i would not recommend to anybody trying to lose weight or on a diet !!. This area which the hotel is situated is ideal for visiting palma, the Cathedral being a short 15min walk, (a walk being the best way to try and burn of the breakfast calories). Numerous restaurants close to the hotel all around the same price all of good quality and service. Anybody wanting to spend a short break in palma this Hotel is perfect, upgrading the room for a sea/cathedral view is well worthwhile. We will definately be using this hotel on our next visit to Palma.
reviews.title: Excellent hotel and Location.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed at Melia Palas Atanea March 2007.
reviews.title: Melia Palas Atenea

reviews.text: We had booked using Expedia, and were expected, which was a relief (even though we were on a no-show list, because our plane was late, and we didn't arrive until 10 pm).
reviews.title: Great Three Night Break

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Very impressed with this hotel. Standard non-smoking room was large with seating area and adequate balcony from which we had a great view of the harbour area. All areas very clean. Beach towels available for use by the pool area. Breakfast buffet excellent. Within comfortable walking distance of the city centre. Would certainly return.
reviews.title: Great Weekend

reviews.text: Very nice classic hotel, one of the best in Palma. The biggest breakfast buffé I have seen. Cleen rooms and the view from the seaside is spectacular. Walking distance to Palma center.
reviews.title: Huge breakfast buffé

likes.liked: — The view, and the pool and poolbar.
likes.disliked: — No wifi internet connection, only spannish TV-channels

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed at this hotel for 8 nights in July and had a fantastic time. We were in a junior suite with Cathedral and harbour views which were spectacular both during the day and at night.
reviews.title: Marvellous Melia

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The staff here were very friendly and the car hire system was amazing, 36 euros with zero excess and no deposit required.
reviews.title: Excellent Location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The outdoor pool was fantastic with good views of the harbour, excellent bar/ restaurant service and free towels.
reviews.title: Location Location Location

aka: Melia Palas Atenea Hotel Palma De Mallorca
